mapper.sql: id, student_id, course_id, unit_id, word_id, word, syllable, word_chinese, fault_time, push, memory_strength,`group`, `type`, update_time
sc.id, sc.student_id, sc.course_id, sc.unit_id, sc.word_id, sc.word, sc.syllable,sc.group, sc.word_chinese, sc.fault_time, sc.push, sc.memory_strength, sc.type, sc.update_time
mapper.select: select distinct a.id, a.word, b.word_chinese, b.memory_strength, a.recordpicurl, b.fault_time, b.unit_id, a.sound_mark, a.small_picture_url smallPictureUrl, a.middle_picture_url middlePictureUrl, a.high_picture_url highPictureUrl from vocabulary a INNER JOIN study_capacity b on a.id = b.word_id and b.unit_id = #{unitId} inner join unit_vocabulary_new voNew on voNew.vocabulary_id=a.id inner join learn_new leaNew on leaNew.unit_Id=voNew.unit_id and b.student_id = #{studentId} and voNew.group=#{group} and b.push < #{dateTime} and leaNew.easy_or_hard=#{easyOrHard} and b.memory_strength < 1 and b.type=#{type} and a.delStatus = 1 ORDER BY b.push LIMIT 0,1
